1232.content:
Everything was in place, everyone was ready. Luke was just about to signal R2.
But then Jabba sensed trouble, something wasn't right here.
Seeing an astromech droid acting suspicions he immediately called to his guards.

"Guards! seize that droid, now!" He roared in Huttese.

R2 tried to defend himself, but was shot by a gamorrean. A hail of sparks
and droid parts flew everywhere. Luke distracted by the commotion fail's to see
the weequay push him off from behind. He grabs the plank as lando fires on
the guards, but its too late. In the chaos he Chewie and a confused Han
are killed. An angry Luke makes it back to his feet, but without a weapon and
clouded by emotion, Boba Fett easily finishes him off from behind.

Leia could only look on in horror as everyone she loved vanished before her eyes.
But she had been through this before, with her homeworld.
For now she must put her emotions aside, now she had to think of herself.

For she must now spend the rest of her life as a sex slave to a slug.

Does Jabba....
